activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#4894
activity.text: Can I have info on who should be able to edit i.e remove the selected item if needed?

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#4894
activity.text:
The X has a function i.e to deselect the selected item. Ideally, it should be hidden for user roles who cannot edit and enabled for user roles who can edit.
